'''''The Worst! Fontaine's Eight Evil Clockwork Knights!''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must use the [[Energy Concentrating Component]]s to unlock the cell in [[Kuisel's Clockwork Workshop]] and open the [[Luxurious Chest]] inside.
